api_list.name: Convert Text To Audio
api_list.description: Write your Prompt Text and Get Audio Url Of That.

api_list.name: Get Speakers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-voice-ai-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com/getSpeakers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-voice-ai-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://text-to-voice-ai-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com/getSpeakers"
